name: Escape The Pipes
description:
Created by Nathan Evans and Allen Ma for Ludam Dare 50: Delay The Inevitable.

Puzzle Platformer with the goal to escape the heat and pollution with your friends before you all evaporate.

This is both of our first jam please leave comments and tips for the future and share with your friends! Hope you enjoy!

NOTE: Currently The game only plays correctly on 1080p resolution. We will work to fix this in post-jam version of the game!
